tuv.seg: This document describes how government departments are managed
Déantar cuir síos anseo ar conas a dhéantar riarú ar na Ranna Rialtais
The civil service in Ireland are the public officials who advise and assist Government Ministers in running their Departments
Is oifigigh phoiblí iad foireann na Státseirbhíse a chuidíonn leis na hAirí Rialtais ina Ranna Rialtais éagsúla
There are 16 Departments of State. Information about each Department and links to their websites
Tá 15 Ranna Stáit in Eireann: éagsúla agus tá nasc ar fáil chuig a suíomh idirlín
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
